member.name: WS_REQUEST_SECURITY_TOKEN_ACTION
member.summary: Defines which set of actions to use when negotiating security tokens using WS-Trust.

member.name: WS_REQUEST_SECURITY_TOKEN_ACTION.WS_REQUEST_SECURITY_TOKEN_ACTION_ISSUE
member.summary: Use the "request" action defined in WS-Trust.

member.name: WS_REQUEST_SECURITY_TOKEN_ACTION.WS_REQUEST_SECURITY_TOKEN_ACTION_NEW_CONTEXT
member.summary: Use the "request" action defined in WS-SecureConversation.

member.name: WS_REQUEST_SECURITY_TOKEN_ACTION.WS_REQUEST_SECURITY_TOKEN_ACTION_RENEW_CONTEXT
member.summary: Use the "renew" action defined in WS-SecureConversation. Requires .
